product_name: Sweet Spot Skirts Groovy Baby Bike Skirt
long_description: The Sweet Spot Skirts Groovy Baby skirt is not only groovy and fun--it's a practical alternative to wrapping your sweatshirt around your waist to cover your tights or bike or running shorts!
